Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Coppy or move the resource. A dialog is shown where you select the folder, where the resource should be copied or moved. Furthermore, you specify the copy/move behavior. Note that drag & drop of resources is also possible to open the dialog.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Delete the resource. Note that the resource is still availabe online until the deleted resource is published. Therefore, deleted resources are only struck out and not removed in the explorer view of the offline project until they are published.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Reset the offline version of the resource to the online version, losing all unpublished changes.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Upload another file that replaces the current one.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: View and change permissions set for the resource

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Edit the categories assigned to the resource.
